text: Big Job is a 1996 educational video game developed by American studio ImageBuilder Software and published by Discovery Channel Multimedia in 1996 for Windows and Macintosh.https://www.mobygames.com/game/win3x/big-job == References == Category:1996 video games Category:Educational video games Category:Educational video game stubs Category:Mac OS games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: Big Job (video game)
